subject: Firearms
lead_paragraph: The mayor and police criticize the Giants receiver, who could face 3 ½ years in prison for possession of a handgun, the team, the N.F.L. and the hospital that treated Burress.
snippet: The mayor and police criticize the Giants receiver, who could face 3 ½ years in prison for possession of a handgun, the team, the N.F.L. and the hospital that treated Burress.
